{"id":573232598,"lang":"java","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1634570025,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"360 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/573232598/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"49.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int index=-1,s=0;\n        if(nums.length==1)\n            return 0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            if(i!=0)\n                s=s+ nums[i-1];\n            int r=0;\n            if(i!=nums.length-1){\n                for(int j=i+1;j<nums.length;j++){\n                    r=r+ nums[j];\n                }\n            }\n            if(s==r){\n                index= i;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        return index;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
